channel.title: Multiple Game Withdrawals
channel.description:
So when your suffering withdrawal from a game or a gaming system do you kill your parents over it or possibly even kidnap yourself? Well these kids did.
[url=http://www.switched.com/2009/01/13/kid-kills-parent-over-halo-3/]Kills parents over Halo 3.[/url]
[url=http://www.switched.com/2008/08/04/wii-deprivation-drives-man-to-kidnap-himself/]Kidnaps himself over Nintendo.[/url]
[url=http://www.switched.com/2007/11/06/boy-hires-hitman-to-kill-parents-after-losing-his-playstation-pr/]Hires a hitman to kill his parents because he got grounded from his Playstation.[/url]
Talk about fucked up shit.

item.title: Multiple Game Withdrawals
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

lol, there was a kid here who ran off home becuz his parent’s would not let him play xbox, few weeks after massive searchs and alot of police time spent they found him dead. ahh the white kids lol

Read full topic

item.title: Multiple Game Withdrawals
item.dc:creator: @Daed Daed
item.description:
@Daed wrote:

Yeah i’ve seen most of these before too

That aint no video game withdrawal thats what i like to call “Fucked in the head”.

Also i think around my area some kid axed his friend cause of playing manhunt, and it got the game banned for a while

Read full topic

item.description:
@Andrew wrote:

Eh, all old news. These kids clearly all had several problems.
